limited.title: Limited
limited.description: Only people added to the private space have access to it

encryption.secondary: Information sent in this workspace is protected with end-to-end encryption.

close.secondary: By closing the private space, other members will not have access to its content anymore.

confirmDialog.text:
Do you really want to close the private space?
Other members will not have access to its content anymore and you won't be able to reopen it.
Being its creator, you will still have access to the content.

leave.secondary: By leaving the private space, you will not have access to its content anymore.

delete.secondary: The private space is closed, only admins can access it
